attributes.additional_details:
Many employers 'top-up' SMP provided the parent returns after 12 months, otherwise the money must be repaid. There is no provision to request longer off to:
- take part in parenting activities / family life / leave work early and stay off due to Covid-19.
- Solve childcare problems for those unable to use grandparents / day care. 
-  Encourages fathers to take shared parental leave.
- Give options if partner faces redundancy. 
Also creates jobs by extending the contracts of those covering leave.
attributes.background: The UK offers 9 months maternity pay and a further 3 months unpaid. We want the right to request longer off work due to Covid-19. Countries such as Australia allow for an additional 12 months unpaid leave to be requested and reasonably considered by their employer after their first year off.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Extend maternity leave by 3 months with pay in light of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306691

Extend Paternity Leave by 3 months with pay in light of Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317745
